Ain't football just beautiful?
when you get punched but it doesnt hurt at first but them you realize it started to bruise.
I don't need a low ping to tear shit up as Mordekaiser.

I can't even tear shit up with 30ms as Mordekaiser, so...
I better git gud

ironicaly, I get better ping in NA than in EUW.

And that's disturbing as an european.
Iceland? :3
Nah, the EUW ping is better than the NA ping here. There just isn't a very big difference.
Weird
It wasn't that bad when I played on your server

It really depends on where you live. most people in EUW have a ping of under 50 and a lot of people have under 20, while on NA 50 is average and 100 isn't unheard of either.
So going from 70 to 120 isn't as big of a difference as going from 20 to 120 is. 
For me personally it is like that, 20-120 and I guess 120 is playable but it's definitely holding me back, some things just aren't possible to do anymore, and sidestepping/flash dodges are a loooot harder, some abilities are impossible to dodge on NA while I can consistently dodge them on EUW.

You can still be a superhero
